DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objective : - To assess effect insulin glulisine post-prandial plasma glucose excursion first hour standard meal comparison insulin aspart obese subject type 2 diabetes . Secondary Objectives : Pharmacodynamic objective : - To assess effect insulin glulisine postprandial plasma glucose excursion 6 hour standard meal comparison insulin aspart . Pharmacokinetic objective : - To assess post-prandial plasma insulin excursion standard meal , treatment group Safety objective : - To assess safety insulin glulisine comparison insulin aspart
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacodynamic Pharmacokinetic Effects Insulin Glulisine Obese Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes After Standard Meal Comparison Insulin Aspart

DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
